title: Thomas de Waal, “The Caucasus: An Introduction” (Oxford UP, 2010)
description:
On August 8, 2008 many Americans learned that Russia had gone to war with a mysterious country called Georgia over an even stranger territory called South Ossetia. Both Georgia and South Ossetia were located not on the southeastern seaboard of the United States, but in a mountainous region south of...
